value.name: Girl Shot Dead By Policeman During Eviction
value.description: Ciara Meyer from Penn Township was pronounced dead after a bullet fired by Constable Clarke Steele at her father, Donald, went through his arm and hit her, Pennsylvania State Police said. Mr Steele, 46, arrived at the apartment at around 10am on Monday to ...

value.name: Fatal shootings by police remain relatively unchanged after two years
value.description: In January, an eviction in Penn Township, Pa., led to the death of 12-year-old Ciara Meyer, the youngest person killed by police gunfire this year. Police said her father, Donald Meyer ...
